db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [syntax.id-quotation] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: Ids do not need quotation marks
What happened?
db:section.db:para: You surrounded an id with quotation marks.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: This might lead to confusion between ids and strings. The QML language does not require quotation marks for ids and forbids more complex string expressions for ids.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, remove the quotation marks:
